commit message: Changed targetSdkVersion to 24 (= Android N) - changed ths basic station handling ==> no more Collection.java (see #95)
fixes a crash in multi-window mode
fixed list refresh after icon replacement, fixed headphone button behavior, possible fix for bluetooth metadata issue (#96)
(re-)added duplicate station warning - now as a dialog ( = better) :-)
fixed UI behavior in case of: - first station added / -last station deleted / -trying to start a shortcut without a corresponding station
moved code to delete shortcut to adapter

Translated using Weblate (Spanish)

Currently translated at 100.0% (116 of 116 strings)
delete now deletes any homescreen shortcuts, tablet layout now keeps track of playback state when resizing (N),
fixed a crash when tapping 'back' while in image picker
